setVector(float[]) - Method in class inkball.Ball
 
spawnBalls() - Method in class inkball.App
Manages the spawning of balls in the game based on a queue system.
This method is responsible for: Checking if there are balls in the queue to spawn. Spawning a new ball at regular intervals from a random spawner. Managing the ball queue after spawning. The method uses frameCount and spawnInterval to determine when to spawn a new ball.
Spawner - Class in inkball
Child class of Tile.
Spawner(int, int) - Constructor for class inkball.Spawner
 
spawners - Variable in class inkball.App
 
spawnInterval - Variable in class inkball.App
Represents the interval at which balls in the queue are spawned at.
sprites - Variable in class inkball.App
 
start - Variable in class inkball.App
Contains the starting coordinates of a mouse press/drag.
